data.Title: Google Search Algorithm Updates & Volatility
data.Description: Google Search ranking algorithm update and volatility heating up and we are expecting a core update soon(ish) - what are you all noticing?

data.Title: Google Clarifies Heading Elements (H1-H6) For SEO
data.Description: Google's Gary Illyes answered a question about heading elements (H1, H2, etc.) and the best way to use them for SEO

data.Title: How to Verify an SEO Agency's Work
data.Description: Google's John Mueller shares tips on checking if the SEO company you hired is actually doing the work they promised.

data.Title: SEO Trends to Watch in 2024
data.Description: Navigate the future of search engine optimization to elevate your online presence and drive meaningful engagement.

data.Title: 5 Steps to Improve Your Website's SEO in 2024
data.Description: These steps will help you to stay ahead of the competition and improve your search engine rankings.

data.Title: Baidu vs. Google: SEO in 2024
data.Description: Learn the similarities and differences between Baidu and Google SEO and how to boost your presence in the Chinese search landscape.

data.Title: Google Confirms Ranking Boost for Country Code Domains
data.Description: Google's Gary Illyes confirmed that country code domain names perform better in search results because Google gives an edge to local sites

data.Title: The Impact of the EU Digital Markets Act on SEO
data.Description: This tweet shares an article discussing the impact of the EU Digital Markets Act on SEO, including Google's response and research findings.

data.Title: How to start an SEO program from scratch in the AI age
data.Description: Find out how to launch a cutting-edge SEO program, focusing on brand authority, content quality and adaptability in this evolving landscape.

data.Title: SEO for Higher Education: Best Practices
data.Description: This article provides SEO best practices for higher education institutions to enhance online visibility, increase brand recognition, attract prospective students, and boost enrollment.

data.Title: Google's Web Crawler Fakes Being "Idle" To Render JavaScript
data.Description: Google's web crawler now simulates "idle" states to better render JavaScript-heavy websites, improving the indexing of content that loads after initial page rendering.

data.Title: Evolving your SEO strategy for Google's upcoming AI search experience
data.Description: This article discusses the need for adapting SEO strategies in light of Google's upcoming AI-powered search experience, particularly the AI Overviews (AIO) feature.

data.Title: 5 ways to incorporate trends into your SEO content strategy
data.Description: Learn how to integrate trends into your SEO content strategy for improved brand awareness and search performance.

data.Title: What SEO Should Know About Brand Marketing
data.Description: Learn how building a strong brand online prepares SEO professionals for a future driven by brand-first strategies.

data.Title: Google AI Overviews:  Keyword Trends & Testing
data.Description: Data-backed analysis of Google AIO keyword triggers supports patterns observed by digital search marketers

data.Title: Google is Testing AI Overviews on Workspace Accounts
data.Description: Google is testing AI Overviews on Workspace accounts (also in the UK)

data.Title: Exa Raises $22MM to Build the Search Engine for AI
data.Description: Exa, an AI research lab, has raised $22 million in funding to develop a search engine specifically designed for the AI age.

data.Title: Anthropic Releases Claude App for Android
data.Description: Anthropic has released an Android app for its AI chatbot, Claude, in a move seen as an attempt to compete with ChatGPT.

data.Title: Google's Project Astra: A Universal AI Agent
data.Description: Google's Project Astra, a universal AI agent, could be released by the end of the year, according to DeepMind leader Demis Hassabis.

data.Title: Google Search Notes is Dead
data.Description: Google launched Notes in Search 8 months ago as a labs experiment - that experiment ends today.

data.Title: Google Testing New Search Results Features
data.Description: Google is testing several new features in its search results, including highlighting words in blue, using light background colors, and renaming "short videos" to "quick takes".

data.Title: Google Knowledge Panels Now Show Store Ratings
data.Description: Google is now showing store ratings in knowledge panels, separate from local star ratings.

data.Title: Google Ads Updates: Intent Match, Query Refinements & More
data.Description: Google Ads has made several updates, including renaming "broad match" to "intent match" in Japan and testing query refinements for ad carousels.

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Rolling Out This Month
data.Description: Google Merchant Center Next now rolling out to all merchants this month

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Now Supports Supplemental Feeds
data.Description: Google Merchant Center Next now finally supports supplemental feed/source support

data.Title: New Ecommerce Tools: July 18, 2024
data.Description: This week: AI-powered shopping assistants, crowdfunding, social commerce, big data, livestream shopping, subscriptions, app development, and cross-border payments.

data.Title: Amazon Prime Day Recap: Shoppers Prioritize Household Items
data.Description: Market research firm Numerator said the average order size on Prime Day so far is $59.78, according to data culled from nearly 7,500 Amazon orders by more than 4,000 households.

data.Title: Google URL Shortener Links to Stop Working in 2025
data.Description: Google URL Shortener links will no longer be available: "Links built with the Google URL Shortener in the form goo.gl* will be impacted, and these URLs will no longer return a response after August 25th, 2025.

data.Title: Google Business Profile Chat Discontinued
data.Description: This is just a reminder that Google has discontinued Google Business Profile chat yesterday and call history is going away.
